text:
#IOM, @IFRC with @ICRC held a high-level policy dialogue on how to implement an inclusive, equitable #vaccine roll-out including for 'people on the move' e.g. #migrants and those #displaced internally or across borders.
#WorldImmunizationWeek #VaccinesWork #VaccineEquity #COVID19 https://t.co/APQtnISOSG
